title.rendered: Focus of India, UAE talks: Energy, food; Rupee-Dirham trade

content.rendered:
India and the United Arab Emirates held wide-ranging discussions on Tuesday on strengthening energy and food security linkages amid geopolitical upheavals. They also discussed launching bilateral trade in the national currencies, rupee and dirham.

External affairs minister S Jaishankar met the foreign minister of the UAE, Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed Al Nahyan, in Delhi. The meeting was also attended by the UAE minister of state for international cooperation, Reem Al Hashimy, and India’s f ..
